messages.subject: Freebies TONIGHT at Borders - storewide! - Teachers "Back To School" Open House at Borders
messages.msgSnippet: Just received this e-mail below, generated from Borders.  Lots of freebies tonight (free treats, door prizes, etc....)  So, thought I d pass this along to
messages.messageBody:
Just received this e-mail below, generated from Borders.  Lots of freebies tonight (free treats, door prizes, etc....)  So, thought I'd pass this along to fellow unschoolers, as it appears to be storewide.  And by chance, tonight is our monthly Unschoolers Parents Night Out at Borders, here in northern Ohio, so it looks like we picked a great night! 


           Carol Reinhard            UWWG Coordinator Unschoolers Winter Waterpark Gatherings   http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UWWG/
  http://www.ugo.unschoolgathering.com/

--- On Thu, 8/27/09, Hank Richard SAR (B0434) <hrichard@...> wrote:

From: Hank Richard SAR (B0434) <hrichard@...>
Subject: TONIGHT! - Teachers "Back To School" Open House at Borders
Date: Thursday, August 27, 2009, 2:07 PM



Join us tonight at 7:00pm for our Back to School event only for teachers.
 

Tour our new Teaching Zone
See all that's new in our expanded Kid's Books, Toys & Games area
Visit Borders Ink!  Our new Young Adult area
Door Prizes including Borders Gift Card
Treats from Seattle's Best Cafe
Information on great new books for all grades
Sign up for the new Classroom Discount card -  25% year-round savings for the classroom
And Educator's Appreciation event is September 29 - October 7 and this year you will save 30% for your classroom and personal purchases. 

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
